participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, loves to sing and explore the world around her.
participant_1.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Friendly and talkative, enjoys sharing stories about family and hobbies.
participant_2.background: i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor.

content.text:
Hey! What's up? üòÖ.
I do like to talk about myself, am four years old
i'm fine, thanks, and how are you?
oh feeling good . my house is sparkling clean . love cleaning. what do you like to do ?
i enjoy walking and playing with my dog
cool ! sometimes i take my two kids up into the mountains for hikes .. Also, try to guess: i like to ...
are you kidding me? me tooüòå
i guess you do not like my mustache . sorry to hear. how are you doing ?
after while crocodile , not to soon baboon. how are you tonight ?
after while crocodile , not to soon baboon. how is it going ? üòÅ
